title: Sienna Miller looks effortlessly chic in champagne hued fan-detail dress
text:
She is one of Hollywood's hottest stars who always brings the glamour on the red carpet.

And Sienna Miller looked chic as she attended the Savannah Film Festival in Georgia on Monday.

The Layer Cake actress, 37, exuded elegance in a champagne hued fan-detail dress with stylish pleats as she took her place on the pink carpet.

Style: Sienna Miller looked chic as she attended the Savannah Film Festival in Georgia on Monday

The gorgeous dress featured diamante and silver detail across the neckline and shoulders, cinching in at her slender waist with a gold chain belt.

The gown flowed into a chic pleated skirt with the star adding height with silver sandals.

Her caramel tresses were pulled into a chic updo while her pretty features were enhanced with feline flicks of liner and scarlet lipstick.

Although now in the States, Sienna made an appearance on the BBC's The Graham Norton Show in London earlier in October.

Wow: The Layer Cake actress, 37, exuded elegance in a champagne hued fan-detail dress with stylish pleats as she took her place on the pink carpet

The actress spoke about her role in The Loudest Voice - which saw her undergo four hours of prosthetics every day to transform into Beth Ailes, the wife of former Fox News CEO Roger Ailes.

Sienna detailed how she would get her boyfriend Lucas Zwirner, 28, to passionately kiss her in the street - while wearing facial prosthetics, leaving tourists 'horrified.'

Asked about playing a character 20-years older than herself, the Layer Cake star said: 'I walked down the street with my quite young-looking boyfriend and asked him to kiss me passionately in front of a crowd of tourists.

Shimmer: The gown flowed into a chic pleated skirt with the star adding height with silver sandals

'They were horrified at the sight of this young boy kissing his nana!'

Sienna previously told how she enjoyed the experience of wearing prosthetics because it made both she and co-star Russell Crowe, 55, 'unrecognisable'.

Appearing on This Morning, she said: 'Russell Crowe had a lot [of prosthetics] on. It was a four-hour job, everyday for a long time.

'For the first three days I was laughing a lot, we were completely unrecognisable. But I found it liberating as it's a mask.'
description: Sienna Miller looked chic as she attended the Savannah Film Festival in Georgia on Monday.
